languages.text: "Ты меня отвергаешь? Сейчас?" {n}Ирлиэт замирает, и странное выражение вырисовывается на ее тонком лице.{/n} "Что ж. Похоже, я все еще слишком плохо понимаю людей. Но я уважаю твои желания, как и ты все это время старал{mf|ся|ась} уважать мои".

"You are rejecting me? Now?" {n}Yrliet goes still, an indefinable expression appearing on her delicate face.{/n} "Well, it seems that I am still terrible at understanding humans. But I respect your wishes, just as you have tried to respect mine all this time."
languages.original_text: "Ты меня отвергаешь? Сейчас?" {n}Ирлиэт замирает, и странное выражение вырисовывается на ее тонком лице.{/n} "Что ж. Похоже, я все еще слишком плохо понимаю людей. Но я уважаю твои желания, как и ты все это время старал{mf|ся|ась} уважать мои".

traits.locale_text: "You reject me? Now?" {n}Yrliet freezes, an indefinable expression appears on her fine face.{/n} "Well, it seems that I'm still bad at understanding humans. But I respect your wishes — just as you have tried to respect mine this entire time".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You reject me? Now?" {n}Yrliet freezes, an indefinable expression appears on her fine face.{/n} "Well, it seems that I'm still bad at understanding humans. But I respect your wishes — just as you have tried to respect mine this entire time".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You are rejecting me? Now?" {n}Yrliet goes still, an indefinable expression appearing on her delicate face.{/n} "Well, it seems that I am still terrible at understanding humans. But I respect your wishes, just as you have tried to respect mine all this time."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “你是在拒绝我吗？到了这种时候？”{n}伊莉耶特僵在原地，美丽的面容上浮现出难以言喻的表情。{/n}“好吧，看来我还是不太理解人类。不过，我尊重你的意愿，就像你一直以来努力尊重我的意愿那样。”
languages.original_text: "You are rejecting me? Now?" {n}Yrliet goes still, an indefinable expression appearing on her delicate face.{/n} "Well, it seems that I am still terrible at understanding humans. But I respect your wishes, just as you have tried to respect mine all this time."

traits.locale_text: “你是在拒绝我吗？到了这种时候？”{n}伊莉耶特僵在原地，美丽的面容上浮现出难以言喻的表情。{/n}“好吧，看来我还是不太理解人类。不过，我尊重你的意愿，就像你一直以来努力尊重我的意愿那样。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «¿Me rechazas? ¿Ahora?». {n}Yrliet se queda helada, y su delicado rostro adopta una expresión inescrutable.{/n} «Vaya, por lo visto sigo sin poder entender a los humanos. Pero respetaré tus deseos, igual que tú has procurado respetar los míos todo este tiempo».
languages.original_text: "You are rejecting me? Now?" {n}Yrliet goes still, an indefinable expression appearing on her delicate face.{/n} "Well, it seems that I am still terrible at understanding humans. But I respect your wishes, just as you have tried to respect mine all this time."

traits.locale_text: «¿Me rechazas? ¿Ahora?». {n}Yrliet se queda helada, y su delicado rostro adopta una expresión inescrutable.{/n} «Vaya, por lo visto sigo sin poder entender a los humanos. Pero respetaré tus deseos, igual que tú has procurado respetar los míos todo este tiempo».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Vous me rejetez ? Maintenant ? » {n}Yrliet se fige et une expression indéfinissable apparaît sur son visage délicat.{/n} « Eh bien, on dirait que je suis toujours incapable de comprendre les humains. Mais je respecterai votre souhait, tout comme vous avez respecté les miens jusqu'ici. »
languages.original_text: "You are rejecting me? Now?" {n}Yrliet goes still, an indefinable expression appearing on her delicate face.{/n} "Well, it seems that I am still terrible at understanding humans. But I respect your wishes, just as you have tried to respect mine all this time."

traits.locale_text: « Vous me rejetez ? Maintenant ? » {n}Yrliet se fige et une expression indéfinissable apparaît sur son visage délicat.{/n} « Eh bien, on dirait que je suis toujours incapable de comprendre les humains. Mais je respecterai votre souhait, tout comme vous avez respecté les miens jusqu'ici. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr weist mich ab? Jetzt?" {n}Yrliet verstummt, und auf ihrem zarten Gesicht erscheint ein undefinierbarer Ausdruck.{/n} "Gut, anscheinend verstehe ich die Menschen nach wie vor überhaupt nicht. Aber ich respektiere Euren Wunsch, so wie Ihr die ganze Zeit versucht habt, meinen zu respektieren."
languages.original_text: "You are rejecting me? Now?" {n}Yrliet goes still, an indefinable expression appearing on her delicate face.{/n} "Well, it seems that I am still terrible at understanding humans. But I respect your wishes, just as you have tried to respect mine all this time."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr weist mich ab? Jetzt?" {n}Yrliet verstummt, und auf ihrem zarten Gesicht erscheint ein undefinierbarer Ausdruck.{/n} "Gut, anscheinend verstehe ich die Menschen nach wie vor überhaupt nicht. Aber ich respektiere Euren Wunsch, so wie Ihr die ganze Zeit versucht habt, meinen zu respektieren."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「我を拒むだと？今さら？」{n}ユリエットは静止し、彼女の繊細な顔によくわからない表情が浮かぶ。{/n}「どうやら、我はまだ人間を理解するのが苦手なようだ。しかし、お前の意思は尊重しよう。お前がこれまでずっと我の意思を尊重しようとしてきたようにな」
languages.original_text: "You are rejecting me? Now?" {n}Yrliet goes still, an indefinable expression appearing on her delicate face.{/n} "Well, it seems that I am still terrible at understanding humans. But I respect your wishes, just as you have tried to respect mine all this time."

traits.locale_text: 「我を拒むだと？今さら？」{n}ユリエットは静止し、彼女の繊細な顔によくわからない表情が浮かぶ。{/n}「どうやら、我はまだ人間を理解するのが苦手なようだ。しかし、お前の意思は尊重しよう。お前がこれまでずっと我の意思を尊重しようとしてきたようにな」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: "You are rejecting me? Now?" {n}Yrliet goes still, an indefinable expression appearing on her delicate face.{/n} "Well, it seems that I am still terrible at understanding humans. But I respect your wishes, just as you have tried to respect mine all this time."

languages.text: "Beni reddediyorsun, öyle mi? Hem de şimdi?" {n}Yrliet kalakalıyor ve narin yüzünde anlaşılmaz bir ifade beliriyor.{/n} "İnsanları hâlâ anlayamıyormuşum demek. Fakat senin bunca zamandır yaptığın gibi ben de senin isteklerine saygı duyuyorum."
languages.original_text: "You are rejecting me? Now?" {n}Yrliet goes still, an indefinable expression appearing on her delicate face.{/n} "Well, it seems that I am still terrible at understanding humans. But I respect your wishes, just as you have tried to respect mine all this time."

traits.locale_text: "Beni reddediyorsun öyle mi? Hem de şimdi?" {n}Yrliet kalakalıyor, narin yüzünde anlaşılmaz bir ifade beliriyor.{/n} "Demek ki insanları hâlâ hiç anlayamıyorum. Fakat senin bunca zamandır yaptığın gibi ben de senin isteklerine saygı duyuyorum."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
